## C2) PR template

Create `.github/pull_request_template.md`:

```md
## Summary

What does this PR change?

## Testing

- [ ] `ruff check .`
- [ ] `black --check .`
- [ ] `pytest`

## Checklist

- [ ] Title is clear and scoped
- [ ] PR description explains the “why”
- [ ] Docs updated if needed
